channel.title: Comments on: Some people really hate stuff…
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: You have no idea how popular they are here. Practically everyone has a pair.
item.content:encoded: You have no idea how popular they are here. Practically everyone has a pair.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
"being called the uggs of summer is not a compliment", that's funny. Of course Sharon has the uggs as well but for her defend I must say that she doesn't like them nor the crocs very much, and I am the one who them for her. bummer that they don't have the shirt in s. Anyway when I bought crocs, about two years ago, I thought they looked very cool. Here they are popular to some degree but I heard that everyone in Israel has them. bummer-2.
Does Junior=women in Canada?
item.content:encoded:
“being called the uggs of summer is not a compliment”, that’s funny. Of course Sharon has the uggs as well but for her defend I must say that she doesn’t like them nor the crocs very much, and I am the one who them for her. bummer that they don’t have the shirt in s. Anyway when I bought crocs, about two years ago, I thought they looked very cool. Here they are popular to some degree but I heard that everyone in Israel has them. bummer-2.

Does Junior=women in Canada?
